summary: This mod adds two standalone followers - no other mods needed.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ffe599][size=5]Description:[/size][/color]

[size=3]This mod adds two standalone followers to the game - no other mods are needed.
They can both be found at the Candlehearth Hall in Windhelm.

UNP Version: uses UNP Skinny body, smaller characters
   
CBBE Version: uses CBBE Curvy body with increased height for a bit more mature looking characters [/size]


[size=5][color=#ffe599]Characters:[/color][/size]


[size=4][u]Kana:[/u][/size]
[size=3]She's the older one of the two sisters. Her main weapon is a sword, but she knows how to use a bow as well.

Combat Style: 1H Damage/Tank
Level: 10+ (autoleveled)
Body: UNP Skinny / CBBE Curvy
Inventory: Minidress, 1h Sword (Katana)[/size]

[size=4][u]Miyu:[/u][/size]
[size=3]She's the younger sister and has been trained to use her daggers to ambush and disarm her enemies. 

Combat Style: 1H Daggers/Dual Wield (when she feels like it)
Level: 10+ (autoleveled)
Body: UNP Skinny [size=3]/ CBBE Curvy[/size]
Inventory: Minidress, 2 Daggers (Sai)[/size]


[size=5][color=#ffe599]Recommended Mods:[/color][/size]
[size=3]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]Amazing Follower Tweaks[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52019/?]Follower Commentary Overhaul[/url]
[/size]

[size=5][color=#ffe599]Credits:[/color][/size]
[size=3]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602]Fair Skin Complexion[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800]XP32 Maximum Skeleton[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951]Enhance Character Edit[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61178/?]Adorable Face[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47376]UNP Minidresses Collection[/url] (UNP version only)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14213]Sai[/url]
SG Hair Pack 268 by hellosanta[/size]


[size=5][color=#ffe599]Screenshots:[/color][/size]

[/size]
author: Astavos
